DOC.brief_summary: A study compare topical application Aczone® plus Differin® versus Duac® plus Differin® patient severe facial acne ( facial acne vulgaris ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Aczone® Plus Differin® Versus Duac® Plus Differin® Patients With Severe Facial Acne
DOC.criteria: Severe facial acne ( acne vulgaris ) History significant anemia hemolysis History enteritis ( eg , regional enteritis , ulcerative colitis , pseudomembranous colitis , antibioticassociated colitis ) History lupus , rosacea , seborrheic dermatitis
